name: Dead Apocalypse Survival HD
description:
Take back New York City after a huge virus outbreak! The apocalypse is here, and you have to play for 55 missions and a special survival mission, with a open world scenario, use machine guns, axes, rocket launchers and even a army tank to eliminate the walking zombies!

Play as a zombie hunter and kill all the infected. Find supplies to avoid starvation to survive as many days as possible. Fight the bosses and prove that you are a real zombie killer!

ADVISE: “Be aware! This is quite scary! Load your guns and fight!”.

MAIN FEATURES:
- 55 missions to play, 11 bosses to fight and a special Survival Mode.
- 14 different weapons and 12 different vehicles to choose, including a army tank!
- 11 hunters, each with their own abilities.
- First person and Third person modes to play!
- A big variety of dead ones walking NPCs.
- Enjoy a open world New York city, or what's left of it, and make it your destruction playground.
- Collect food, medical supplies and gas on survival mode to stay alive longer, use cash to call for supplies.
- An apocalypse simulation with endless fun.
- Listen to the noises, and take advantage over the dead ones walking around the city searching for you.
- Frequent updates, so the game is always getting better.
- The best open world walking zombie game you'll find.

Kill all the undead zombies walking around the city and make sure they stay dead this time! The survival mission allows you to challenge yourself more, in a fun and addicted game!

Give us your feedback! We always listen to your reviews to improve the game to give you the best experience!
